data.message: I am unable to determine why my company's Facebook page has been "unpublished" by Facebook. We can't figure out what we did to "one or more of the Facebook Pages Term(s)". Can you please communicate what the exact reason is for this so I can address the concern? Page is KIO Networks USA. Thank you!

replies.message: Hey Jason. You can learn more about published and unpublished Pages here: http://on.fb.me/1V3uNHr. Keep in mind that newly created Pages may be unpublished due to inactivity. -Nancy

Thanks, but this doesn't answer my question. Facebook unpublished my company's page which has been up for quite some time. We're not sure what caused the action by FB and what we need to do to rectify the situation.

Facebook I am at a loss for what to do about my page. It has been unpublished by the FB team for a violation of terms, but I can't identify what the violation was. Can you please provide additional clarification and guidance as to what I need to do to get it back up?
